content.text: We help tech companies organise their activities, optimise their cost structure whilst ensuring compliance with local legal requirements, depending from the type of commercial activity. We provide strategic guidance that supports your expansion plans and minimises regulatory risks.
Corporate and tax structuring (jurisdiction selection)

We analyse your business model, revenue streams, and operational requirements to recommend the most suitable jurisdictions for your corporate structure. Our assessment considers factors including tax efficiency, regulatory environment, international treaties, and practical business considerations to create corporate structures that aligns your key commercial objectives.
Company incorporation (30+ jurisdictions)
We facilitate company registration across more than 30 jurisdictions, including popular technology hubs in the EU, UK, USA, CIS, and other key markets.
Main locations:

items: European Union: Poland, Estonia, Netherlands, Cyprus, Ireland, Malta

content.text: Bank account opening
We assist with opening corporate bank accounts in your chosen jurisdictions.
Corporate governance documents. Share Purchase Agreements, Shareholders Agreements

We design legal framework for your business relations with partners, investors, management and other stakeholders. We draft and negotiate investment documentation including share purchase agreements, shareholders' agreements, and related corporate governance documents. We ensure these agreements address sector-specific issues such as intellectual property rights, employee share schemes, and exit provisions.
SAFE and investment agreements
We guide companies on formulating investment attraction activities. We prepare Simple Agreements for Future Equity (SAFE) and other investment instruments commonly used in start-up funding scenarios.
Special programmes and zones for IT companies and start-ups (IT-Park, Virtual zone)

We guide companies through applications for special economic zones, IT parks, and government incentive programmes designed for technology businesses. These programmes often provide significant tax advantages, simplified regulatory procedures, and other benefits.

Navigate complex regulatory landscapes with our comprehensive licensing and compliance services. We help tech companies obtain necessary licenses and maintain regulatory compliance across multiple jurisdictions.
Technology Licensing
Assistance with software licensing, SaaS compliance, and technology transfer agreements across international markets.
Gaming and iGaming Licenses
Specialized support for gaming industry licensing including:
Financial Services Licensing
Support for fintech companies seeking financial services licenses, payment institution licenses, and cryptocurrency exchange permits.
Comprehensive legal support tailored specifically for IT companies, startups, and technology businesses operating in the digital economy.
Software Development Agreements
Drafting and negotiating software development contracts, including:
Data Protection and Privacy
GDPR compliance, data processing agreements, and privacy policy development for global operations.
Cloud Services and Infrastructure
Legal support for cloud service providers and infrastructure companies, including service level agreements and terms of service.
Protect your most valuable assets with our comprehensive intellectual property services designed for technology companies and innovative businesses.
Patent Protection
Strategic patent filing and portfolio management:
Trademark and Brand Protection
Comprehensive brand protection services including trademark registration, brand monitoring, and enforcement actions.
Copyright and Trade Secrets
Protection of software code, documentation, and proprietary business information through copyright registration and trade secret policies.
Specialized legal services for game development studios, publishers, and gaming companies, including confidentiality protection and business migration support.
Game Development Contracts
Comprehensive legal support for game development:
Confidentiality and NDAs
Protection of sensitive business information through robust confidentiality agreements and non-disclosure policies.
Business Migration Services
Support for companies relocating operations, including regulatory compliance, tax optimization, and staff relocation assistance.
Expert representation in international commercial disputes and arbitration proceedings, with particular expertise in technology and business disputes.
International Commercial Arbitration
Representation before major arbitration institutions:
Technology Disputes
Specialized expertise in resolving technology-related disputes including software development disputes, IP infringement claims, and licensing disagreements.
Investment Disputes
Protection of investor interests in complex commercial disputes, including shareholder disputes and investment protection proceedings.
Comprehensive immigration and relocation services for individuals and families, with specialized support for entrepreneurs and business professionals.
EU Residency Programs
Access to European residency through various programs:
Business Immigration
Specialized support for business professionals, entrepreneurs, and investors seeking to relocate for business purposes.
Family Reunification
Assistance with family reunification procedures and dependent visa applications across multiple jurisdictions.
